mn119:1.1: This discourse features the same meditation practices found under the “observation of the body” in the Satipaṭṭhānasutta ([mn10]()). Here they are seen with more of a focus on serenity.
mn119:4.7: For “Memories and thioughts of the lay life” (_gehasitā sarasaṅkappā_) see [mn125:23.5](), [sn54.8:5.2]().
